review: Just got our new toy. The array of available material is dizzying. We have just begun to explore all the features and options. One little nit pik however. In the commercials I've seen there is no mention of the need for access to an additional 110V socket for a power supply. The impression given is that it is powered via the HDMI port. Not so.Nit pik aside we are having a blast with this thing. In our are on-demand streaming is not available, so this is a new experience as well.Definitely worth the cost.I have only one concern. There appears to be no way to turn the Fire Stick "OFF". And since it is connected to the Internet does it make it possible for Google to monitor what we watch on our TV?
